page.title: 17Newbridge In 1965 1a
page.content:
NEWBRIDGE IN 1965 researched by Sarah Probert Q.What entertainment was there in the Newbridge area? People either went to the cinema or to a dance.People did not go out for a meal as they do now.I always went to the Memo, where there were three dances a week, one on Tuesday, one on Thursday and a big one Saturday, you would buy your ticket and it didn't finish till twelve so if you lived a long way from there you would buy a bus ticket because they had special buses.
Q.Were there vandals like today? No not really but there was always a fight between the boys from different villages.They used to wear knuckle dusters and chains and they always fought down the boys clubs.
